MONSTERS AS RACES

While every monsterhas the statistics that a player would need to play the creature as a character, most 몬스터 are not suitable as PCs. Creatures who have an 지능 score of 2 or lower, who have no way to communicate, or who are so different from other PCs that they disrupt the campaign should not be used.  Some creatures have strange innate 능력 or great physical power, and thus are questionable at best as characters (except in high-레벨 campaigns).

Starting 레벨 of a Monster PC: 몬스터 suitable for play have a 레벨 보정 given in their statistics. Add a monster’s 레벨 보정 to its 히트 다이스 and class 레벨 to get the creature’s effective character 레벨, or ECL. Effectively, 몬스터 with a 레벨 보정 become multiclass character when they take class 레벨. A creature’s “monster class” is always a 선호 직업, and the creature never takes XP 페널티 for having it.

Humanoids and Class 레벨: Creatures with 1 or less HD replace their monster 레벨 with their character 레벨. The monster loses 공격 보너스, 내성 굴림 보너스, 스킬, and 특기 granted by its 1 monster HD and gains 공격 보너스, save 보너스, 스킬, 특기, and other class 능력 of a 1st-레벨 character of the appropriate class.

Characters with more than 1 Hit Die because of their race do not get a feat for their first class 레벨 as members of the common 종족 do, and they do not multiply the skill points for their first class 레벨 by four. Instead, they have already received a feat for their first Hit Die because of race, and they have already multiplied their racial skill points for their first Hit Die by four.

레벨 보정 and Effective Character 레벨: To determine the effective character 레벨(ECL) of a monster character, add its 레벨 보정 to its racial 히트 다이스 and character class 레벨.

Use ECL instead of character levelto determine how many experience points a monster character needs to reach its next 레벨. Also use ECL to determine starting wealth for a monster character.

Monster characters treat 스킬 mentioned in their monster entry as 직업 스킬.

If a monster has 1 Hit Die or less, or if it is a template creature, it must start the game with one or more class 레벨, like a regular character. If a monster has 2 or more 히트 다이스, it can start with no class 레벨 (though it can gain them later).

Even if the creature is of a kind that normally advances by 히트 다이스 rather than class 레벨 a PC can gain class 레벨 rather than 히트 다이스.

히트 다이스: The creature’s 히트 다이스 equal the number of class 레벨 it has plus its racial 히트 다이스. Additional 히트 다이스 gained from taking 레벨 in a character class never affect a creature’s size like additional racial 히트 다이스 do.

Feat Acquisition and Ability Score Increases: A monster’s total 히트 다이스, not its ECL, govern its acquisition of 특기 and ability score increases.

능력 점수 for Monster PCs: While a 몬스터 statistics give 능력 점수 for a typical creature of a certain kind, any “monster” creature that becomes an adventurer is definitely not typical. Therefore, when creating a PC from a creature, check to see if the creature’s entry has any 능력 점수 of 10 or higher. If so, for each score, subtract 10 (if the score is even) or 11 (if the score is odd) to get the creature’s 수정치 for that ability based on its race or kind. Generate the character’s 능력 점수 as normal, then add the racial 능력 수정치 to get their 능력 점수.

Note: Some 몬스터 have base 능력 점수 other than 10 and 11.  If alternate scores were used this will be indicated in the monster entry.  Also, some 몬스터 that make good PCs have their racial 능력 수정치 and other traits already listed in their monster entry.

For 능력 점수 lower than 10, the procedure is different. First, determine the character’s 능력 점수, and compare that number to the monster’s average ability score, using either the table below that applies to 지능 or the table that applies to the other five 능력 점수.

The separate table for 지능 ensures that no PC ends up with an 지능 score lower than 3. This is important, because creatures with an 지능 score lower than 3 are not playable characters. Creatures with any ability score lower than 1 are also not playable.

Other Statistics for 몬스터: Creatures with 히트 다이스 of 1 or less have normal, class-based 히트 다이스 and features. They get 스킬 and 특기 appropriate to a 1st-레벨 character (even if they have a 레벨 보정).

Those with 2 or more 히트 다이스 have statistics based on these 히트 다이스 plus 히트 다이스 for class 레벨(if any).

Experience for 몬스터: A monster with 히트 다이스 of 1 or less, no 레벨 보정, and class 레벨 uses the same tables as standard PC 종족 when determining experience needed.

A monster with 히트 다이스 of 1 or less, a 레벨 보정, and class 레벨 adds its class 레벨, Hit Die, and 레벨 보정 together when determining experience needed (class 레벨 + HD + 레벨 보정).

A monster with more than one Hit Die, a 레벨 보정, and class 레벨 adds its 히트 다이스, class 레벨, and 레벨 보정 together when determining experience needed (HD + 레벨 보정 + class 레벨).
